1371: Wasseliin was born in Walker straet in 1371.
1372: Lost mother at the age of 1.
Diddekin took care of Wasseliin since Wasseliin was 2.
1383: Lost father at the age of 12.
Lutgeri took care of Wasseliin since Wasseliin was 13.
1389: Got married to Marcibilia at age 19 in 1389.
Wasseliin moved to Slyck straet.A.7 after marriage.
1391: Had a son with Marcibilia, Wasseliin, at age 20.
1392: Had a son with Marcibilia, Poppo, at age 21.
1394: Had a daughter with Marcibilia, Sipper, at age 23.
1397: Had a daughter with Marcibilia, Lenildis, at age 26.
1399: Lost his wife Marcibilia while she was giving birth to Symon in 1399.
Lost son Symon when Symon was 1 years old.
Became caretaker of Wasseliin, Poppo, Sipper, Lenildis at age 29.
Got married a second time to Hadewigis at age 29 in 1399.
Had Hadewigis move in at Slyck straet.A.7 after marriage.
